ConnectingEndPoints
open /SystemWebExtensionsAUT/Sys.Net.ConnectingEndPoints/ConnectingEndPoints.aspx
pause 500
click Button1
assertAlert Performing Get Web request.
assertAlert Target Url: getTarget.htm
waitForTextPresent Hello there. I got your GET Web request!
click Button2
assertAlert Performing Post Web request.
assertAlert Target Url: postTarget.aspx
waitForTextPresent Yes, I got your POST Web request!
